remarks: Lemma for ~ pwfseq .  Derive a final contradiction from the function ` F ` in ~ pwfseqlem3 .  Applying ~ fpwwe2 to it, we get a certain maximal well-ordered subset ` Z ` , but the defining property ` ( Z F ( W `` Z ) ) e. Z ` contradicts our assumption on ` F ` , so we are reduced to the case of ` Z ` finite.  This too is a contradiction, though, because ` Z ` and its preimage under ` ( W `` Z ) ` are distinct sets of the same cardinality and in a subset relation, which is impossible for finite sets.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2015.)
